entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
